Dear <affiliate’s name>,

Update your commission payment method

Neteller has recently announced they will no longer be available in <country>. For that reason, we will be paying your commission into your Deriv.com trading account (also known as your Deriv.com player account) starting July 2020.

To enable receiving payments through your trading account, please change your commission payment method to your Deriv.com trading account by 5 July 2020. If you don’t have a trading account, please create one.

How to change your commission payment method

1. Log in to your affiliate account.

2. Go to Finances > Payment instructions.

3. Click on ‘Change payment instructions’.

4. Under ‘Choose a payment method’, select ‘Deriv.com player account’.

5. Under ‘Player account currency’, enter the currency of your trading account (USD/EUR/GBP/AUD).

6. Under ‘Client Account ID’, enter your trading account ID.

7. Check if all your information is correct, and click ‘Update’.

We will review and update your payment method within 2 days.

If you have any questions, please contact us at affiliates@deriv.com.
